com.fortify.pub.sourcecodeprovider

Interface SourceFileProvider


  • public interface SourceFileProvider
    This interface allows for integration with SCM systems to provide the source files for the Collaboration Module.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SourceFileProvider.Request
      Provides identifying characteristics of a source file

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getEncodingForFile(SourceFileProvider.Request request)
      If the SourceFileProvider knows that the encoding of the file provided in the inputstream may differ from the encoding that SCA identified it can be overriden using this API.
      boolean overrideEncoding()
      If the returned source files have the potential to be encoded in a different charset than the files scanned by SCA this API should return true.
      java.io.InputStream retrieveSourceFile(SourceFileProvider.Request request)
      When passed a project identifier, the relative source file path, the scan identifier and the buildLabel passed to SCA at analysis time (-build-label) this API retrieves an inputstream for the file that was analyzed.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveSourceFile

        java.io.InputStream retrieveSourceFile(SourceFileProvider.Request request)
                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        When passed a project identifier, the relative source file path, the scan identifier and the buildLabel passed to SCA at analysis time (-build-label) this API retrieves an inputstream for the file that was analyzed.
        Returns:
        InputStream - the Inputstream for the described file. Will be closed by consumer
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • overrideEncoding

        boolean overrideEncoding()
        If the returned source files have the potential to be encoded in a different charset than the files scanned by SCA this API should return true. When this is the case the encoding can be corrected on a per file basis by implementing getEncodingForFile()
        Returns:
        true if encoding could be different than analyzed files

      • getEncodingForFile

        java.lang.String getEncodingForFile(SourceFileProvider.Request request)
        If the SourceFileProvider knows that the encoding of the file provided in the inputstream may differ from the encoding that SCA identified it can be overriden using this API. The encoding that SCA identified is provided as the defaultCharsetName parameter.

        NOTE: if overrideEncoding() returns false this API will not be called
        Returns:
        charsetString acceptable for use in the constructor of InputStreamReader
